result.execSummary:
The defendant Calvin O Griffin Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Calvin O Griffin Jr is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Calvin O Griffin Jr was found guilty of Possession of Cocaine/Coca, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(c).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Racine County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
Defendant must submit a DNA sample and pay for the testing within 30 days.  Failure to pay will result in a 4 day  capias to the jail.
Defendant is assessed court costs and is granted time served in lieu of paying the court costs consecutive to the jail time.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Calvin O Griffin Jr

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Time served in RCJ on FTP Capias. Fine shall remain due and owing.
Failure to Pay Capias entered by RCSO/Dispatch.
If unable to post,  ordered to serve  4  consecutive days for contempt.  Debt will remain due and owing.
Per RCSO, DNA collected - 03-04-2016 at 02:00 pm
Per RASO - mandatory jail time has been served

Defendant Calvin O Griffin in court with attorney Keith David O'Donnell.  Defendant Calvin O Griffin in custody.  Bridget D. Brave appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Rose Coulthart. plea to amended charge of Possession of cocaine with a time served recommendation.  Count 2 is dismissed.  Defendant pleas G and is found G.  Judge conducts plea colloquey.   BTC:  30 days RCJ, court costs or spend 30 days in jail as FTP,  time served in lieu of costs.  DNA sample ordered.  Def to pay the cost within 30 days.
Plea hearing scheduled for March 1, 2016 at 10:30 am.
from Zimmerman Consulting Inc. - defendant is in compliance with agency requirements.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Calvin O Griffin in court with attorney Keith David O'Donnell.  Defendant Calvin O Griffin in custody.  Bridget D. Brave appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Mark Garvin.  Waiver of Preliminary hearing filed.  Probable cause found;  bound over.
Defense requests bond modification. 
State does not object. 
BTC: Bond modification is granted. Bond is modified to a $500.00 signature bond. Same conditions apply.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 8, 2016 at 08:15 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Calvin O Griffin in court with attorney Mindy M. Nolan.  Defendant Calvin O Griffin in custody.  Rebecca L Sommers appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, bond set.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.
